Package io.github.shooter.game

Class Bullet

java.lang.Object
io.github.shooter.game.Bullet
public class Bullet extends Object
Represents a bullet shot by a player.

  • Constructor Summary

    Bullet(float x, float y, float dirX, float dirY, int ownerId)
    Creates a new bullet at given position, heading in the given direction.

  • Constructor Details

    • Bullet

      public Bullet(float x, float y, float dirX, float dirY, int ownerId)
      Creates a new bullet at given position, heading in the given direction. If dirX or dirY are big (over 10), treat them as velocity vector directly, otherwise normalize direction and multiply by default speed.
      Parameters:
      x - X position start
      y - Y position start
      dirX - X direction or velocity component
      dirY - Y direction or velocity component
      ownerId - ID of player who fired this bullet

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(float delta)
      Updates bullet position based on velocity and time delta.
      Parameters:
      delta - Time since last update (seconds)

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the bullet by zeroing velocity and marking it stopped.

    • isOutOfBounds

      public boolean isOutOfBounds(float w, float h)
      Checks if the bullet is out of the visible bounds plus some padding.
      Parameters:
      w - Width of the game area
      h - Height of the game area
      Returns:
      true if bullet is out of bounds

    • isExpired

      public boolean isExpired()
      Checks if the bullet's lifetime has expired.
      Returns:
      true if bullet has been alive longer than its lifetime

    • setDamage
